# Prolonged Lapse of Reason (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F (a pinwheel)

**Range:** Close (25 ft + 5 ft/2 levels)

**Target:** 1 creature

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** The Mage's Tower

Creatures affected by this spell become somewhat confused and sluggish. Affected creatures may only take partial actions for the duration.
